offer.title: LOVE Nevada Locals Offer
offer.description: Save 40% on your tickets to The Beatles LOVE for Sunday performances with a valid Nevada ID! Call +1-866-566-9306 and mention “Locals” to redeem this offer.
offer.legalfineprint: Must show valid Nevada ID when picking up tickets. Plus tax and fee. Valid on select seating areas and categories. Valid only for Sunday 7pm and 9:30pm performances. Cannot be combined with any other offer. Management reserves all rights.
